card_text: During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there as Link Material this turn: You can activate 1 of the following effects.$N●Target 1 "Salamangreat" monster in your GY, except "Salamangreat Coyote"; Special Summon it in Defense Position.$N●Target 1 "Salamangreat" card in your GY, except "Salamangreat Coyote"; add it to your hand.$NYou can only use this effect of "Salamangreat Coyote" once per turn.
